title: Developer Curb Appeal: Can't use Solr UI if no cores are present
description:
One way to bootstrap a Solr Cloud instance is to start Solr with no cores, and then later use the REST API to create collections, etc.

However, currently you can't use the Solr Admin GUI until at least one core is added.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: I think this is a dupe - havn't looked up the issue it dupes yet though. I know a couple guys started down the road of addressing this though.
